body_html:
yes, it supports newer version of AMD GPUs, such as GFX8 GPU's (Fiji & Polaris Family) and GFX9 (Vega). I tried AMD RX 480 and works great ! See link below:

https://github.com/ROCmSoftwarePlatform/hiptensorflow/blob/hip/README.ROCm.md

body:
yes,   it supports newer version of AMD GPUs, such as GFX8 GPU's (Fiji & Polaris Family) and GFX9 (Vega).  I tried AMD RX 480 and works great !  See link below:

https://github.com/ROCmSoftwarePlatform/hiptensorflow/blob/hip/README.ROCm.md
